name: SFChooseIdentityPanel
desc: A panel or sheet containing a list of identities that a user can choose from.

items.name: func chooseIdentityPanelShowHelp(SFChooseIdentityPanel!) -> Bool
items.desc: Implements custom help behavior for the modal panel.

items.name: func beginSheet(for: NSWindow!, modalDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, identities: [Any]!, message: String!)
items.desc: Displays a list of identities in a modal sheet from which the user can select an identity.

items.name: func domain() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the domain that will be associated with the chosen identity.

items.name: func helpAnchor() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the current help anchor string for the sheet or panel.

items.name: func identity() -> Unmanaged<SecIdentity>!
items.desc: Returns the identity that the user chose in the panel or sheet.

items.name: func informativeText() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the informative text currently displayed in the panel.

items.name: func policies() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array of policies used to evaluate the status of the displayed certificates.

items.name: func runModal(forIdentities: [Any]!, message: String!) -> Int
items.desc: Displays a list of identities in a modal panel.

items.name: func setAlternateButtonTitle(String!)
items.desc: Customizes the title of the alternate button.

items.name: func setDefaultButtonTitle(String!)
items.desc: Customizes the title of the default button.

items.name: func setDomain(String!)
items.desc: Sets an optional domain in which the identity is to be used.

items.name: func setHelpAnchor(String!)
items.desc: Sets the help anchor string for the sheet or modal panel.

items.name: func setInformativeText(String!)
items.desc: Sets the optional informative text displayed in the panel.

items.name: func setPolicies(Any!)
items.desc: Specifies one or more policies that apply to the displayed certificates.

items.name: func setShowsHelp(Bool)
items.desc: Displays a Help button in the sheet or panel.

items.name: func showsHelp() -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the help button is currently set to be displayed.

items.name: class func shared() -> SFChooseIdentityPanel!
items.desc: Returns a fully initialized, singleton choose identity panel object.
